seo.title: Contact | SustainSage
seo.description: Book a calm, bilingual intro conversation with SustainSage. Learn what to expect, review consent, and share how we can support your UK transition.

hero.title: Get in touch
hero.subtitle: Share what you are navigating and the language you feel most at home in. We will respond with options, not pressure.

expectations.title: What to expect
items: We respond within two UK working days to arrange a 20-minute chemistry chat.
During the chat we clarify goals, language preferences, accessibility needs, and consent.
If coaching is not the right fit, we will suggest other services such as therapy, legal, immigration, medical, or financial advice.

form.title: Send us a note
form.subtitle: Everything you share stays confidential except where law or safeguarding requires us to act.
form.name: Full name
form.message: What would you like to explore?
form.consent: I consent to SustainSage contacting me about coaching. I understand this is not therapy, legal, immigration, medical, or financial advice.
form.privacyNote: We store your details securely and delete them if we do not begin coaching, unless law requires otherwise.

status.success: Thank you. We’ll respond within two working days.
status.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us directly.
status.errorRequired: Please complete all required fields and confirm consent.

sidebar.title: What happens next
sidebar.description: We’ll suggest times for a 20-minute bilingual chemistry chat to see how we can support you.
sidebar.responseCopy: Expect a reply within two UK working days—often sooner.
sidebar.privacyCopy: We keep conversations private except when law or safeguarding obligations require disclosure.
